cause.description:
We are volunteers from the Albany County Correctional Facility and beyond. We are committed to our mission and guided by our philosophy and compassion for the plight of children. Our Goal is to do one fund raiser per year and to constantly monitor the special needs of children in our community. We have done so much for the community in so many different ways. The best way for you to get a feel for the accomplishments we have made is to really just take a look at our site.
1. Children are special gifts and we will do everything in our power to help preserve and support them during their critical stage in life. We are driven by the belief that amazing things happen when people work together to spark the potential in individuals
cause.mission: support seriously ill and underprivileged children during their time of need.
cause.name: Albany County Correctional Facility for Children's Benefit
